title: Cant get anything loots, eg. keys or chest
body: last week i got chat restricted because i toxic and i understand about that and i repay my ban Q, but i still cant get chest or keys, duo to the previous behavior. pls help me fix this problem

replies.body: You will get loot back once you have showed the system your behaviour is improving. Basically, be positive or neutral in games and you'll get loot back soon enough. It's not a set time, but specific to you.
